metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8483 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the Qualcomm power driver could enable a local malicious application to access data outside of its permission levels. This issue is rated as High because it could be used to access sensitive data without explicit user permission. Product: Android. Versions: Kernel-3.10. Android ID: A-33745862. References: QC-CR#1035099.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
